summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3726 for the improvement of Phinney Avenue, from North 67th Street to North 70th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45758, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
